item.title: Pam Bondi, DOJ officials caught off guard by Tish James indictment: Sources
item.description: Sources said that Tish James' indictment for alleged fraud came as surprise.

item.title: Israel-Gaza live updates: Ceasefire in effect as IDF repositions
item.description: U.S. Central Command is establishing a coordination center in Israel to support and monitor the ceasefire agreement, a U.S. official said.

item.title: Police hunt for murder suspect after apparent legal hiccup releases him from jail
item.description: Authorities in Baltimore are seeking custody of a murder suspect who was released from jail in North Carolina due to an apparent legal hiccup, police ...

item.title: WATCH: President Trump signs proclamation protecting Columbus Day name
item.description: President Trump signed a proclamation protecting the name Columbus Day before hosting a Cabinet meeting on Thursday.

item.title: WATCH: Speaker Johnson has emotional exchange with a military mom about shutdown
